title: Inquiry-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Mathematical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and leadership experience within organizations
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based instructional design implemented in smartphone-based microlearning environments, emphasizing critical thinking and mathematical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can apply logical reasoning and critical thinking to solve mathematical problems through inquiry-based instructional design activities.
Learners enhance their ability to connect mathematical concepts to real-world work situations through microlearning tasks in mobile environments.
Learners can develop creative problem-solving strategies through collaboration and feedback with peers and apply them to project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
